Colorado_Springs.Cheyenne Mountain Zoo: The Cheyenne Mountain Zoo is a zoological park located southwest of downtown Colorado Springs, Colorado, on Cheyenne Mountain in the United States. At an elevation of 6,800 feet (2,100 m) above sea level it is the highest zoo in America. The zoo covers 140 acres (57 ha), 40 (16 ha) of which are in use.The zoo houses more than 750 animals, representing nearly 150 different species, with more than 30 endangered species.
